value.title: Catholic Diocese of Raleigh cancels weekend Masses, closes schools due to coronavirus

value.title: Coronavirus in Ohio: All Cincinnati Public Schools now closed on Monday

value.title: CNY schools announce closings due to coronavirus pandemic
